document.full_text: there is no proof of systemic racism at a connecticut beer distributor where a gunman shot dead eight people last year because he said african-americans were treated badly, a police probe concluded.
document.title: no proof of racism at site of 2010 shooting rampage: police
lines_and_colors: there is no proof of systemic racism at a connecticut beer distributor where a gunman shot dead eight people last year because he said african-americans were treated badly, a police probe concluded.
